snippet.title: MindSeize - Release Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Just released! Transfer your mind into a MAG and set out to an epic Action-Adventure with Sci-Fi setting! Aiming to save your daughter, an even bigger threat emerges... Fast-paced combat and extensive exploration awaits, inspired by a wide range of Metroidvania-classics!

©2024 Sometimes You
Created and developed by Kamina Dimension

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
